Dialogue.Value: IN SPACE WAR I，MOST,COMBAT WAS DONE BY,NAVAL BOMBARDMENT!
BUT IN SPACE WAR II，WE,LAUNCHED WEAPONS INTO,HIGH EARTH ORBIT!
I GUESS THIS IS WHAT’S,CALLED THE EVOLUTION,OF WARFARE〜!
THE COLONY REPUBLIC,DECLARED WAR IN BOTH,SPACE WARS!
SPACE WAR I BEGAN IN,2008，AND SPACE WAR II,BEGAN IN 2013!
